heading: Notice
text:
A notice, stating the amount due and the nature of the charge, shall be mailed by the department of finance to
   the last known address of the person whose name appears on the records of the department of finance as being the owner or agent
   of the property or as the person designated by the owner to receive tax bills or, where no name appears, to the property, addressed
   to either the “owner” or the “agent.”
